headline: Latest News In Energy Transition - SonoSolar Rebrands to Lead in Solar Mobility Integration
summary: Sono Group N.V. has rebranded its subsidiary, Sono Motors GmbH, under the new name SonoSolar to emphasize its strategic focus on integrating solar technology in commercial vehicles. This development marks a shift away from manufacturing vehicles to becoming a leading solar mobility integrator for the commercial sector. With the rebranding, SonoSolar aims to deliver high-quality, vehicle-integrated solar solutions, enhancing its role within the energy transition landscape. The move also...
